MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Bridge Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:20PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:48PM on 8th March 2021
